Origin: 襲い来る獣を退けろ！
敗北条件：いずれかのバトルメンバーの戦闘不能
Korean: 패배 조건: 한명 이상의 배틀 멤버의 전투 불능

Name: #REF!
Origin: どうすれば……。

Name: #REF!
Origin: What do we do...

Name: #REF!
Origin:
事情を聞くにはこの狼を
先に倒すしかない……か。
Korean:
사정을 들으려면 이 늑대를
먼저 쓰러뜨릴 수 밖에 없겠…….군.

Name: #REF!
Origin: From the looks of it, this wolf needs to be taken care of first.
Korean:
사정을 들으려면 이 늑대를
먼저 쓰러뜨릴 수 밖에 없겠…….군.

Name: #REF!
Origin:
あー！　まっくろー！！
ネクタルも、だめー！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ah! Weird guy in black! Nectar! Stop it!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
くっ……この鳥！！
邪魔をするな！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Damn bird... Don't get in the way!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
チッ……！　おい！
追い払う策はあるのか！？

Name: #REF!
Origin: Tch! Hey, got any ideas to deal with this?

Name: #REF!
Origin:
…………！
（動きを止めて逃げよう！）

Name: #REF!
Origin: ...! (Seal his movements, then we make a break for it!)

Name: #REF!
Origin:
すまないが少し時間を稼ぎたい。
頼めるだろうか？
Korean: 미안하지만 시간 좀 벌고 싶어. 부탁할 수 있을까?

Name: #REF!
Origin: I apologize, but we need to buy some time. Can we ask this of you?
Korean: 미안하지만 시간 좀 벌고 싶어. 부탁할 수 있을까?

Name: #REF!
Origin:
手間を掛けさせる……！
後で必ず話は聞かせて貰うぞ！
Korean: 귀찮게 만드는군…… 나중에 꼭 이야기는 들려줘야겠어!

Name: #REF!
Origin: Sure aren't shy about asking favors, huh? You better tell me everything you know after this!
Korean: 귀찮게 만드는군…… 나중에 꼭 이야기는 들려줘야겠어!

Name: #REF!
Origin: クシナ！　準備はいいな？

Name: #REF!
Origin: Kushina! Are you ready?

Name: #REF!
Origin: ...! (Here we go!)
悪鬼を率いるゴブリンプリンセスを倒せ！

Name: #REF!
Origin:
兄さん、団長さん！
痺れ香の効果に気を付けて！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Lucius! Captain! Watch out for the numbing agent!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
全部片付くまでは
無理しちゃダメだよ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Don't do anything stupid before it's all cleaned up!

Name: #REF!
Origin: 厄介な……。

Name: #REF!
Origin: All right, all right...

Name: #REF!
Origin:
おまたせー！
ぜんぶ！　かたづいた！

Name: #REF!
Origin: There we go! The air's cleared up now! No more numbing!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ありがとう！
これで全力を出せる！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Thanks! Now we can let loose!

Name: #REF!
Origin: 小癪な……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Impudent brats!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
わー！？
ゴブリンきた！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Waaah! Goblins!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ウグス！　お前達は
この場を離れろ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ugusu! You lot get out of here!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
わかったー！！
きをつけてね！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Okay! Be careful!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ふふ……愛し子達を、
王を奪われた痛み……。

Name: #REF!
Origin: Hehe... The pain you've inflicted upon my beloved children and king...

Name: #REF!
Origin: ワラワが教えてあげる！

Name: #REF!
Origin: I'll return it to you tenfold!

Name: #REF!
Origin: ティナ！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Teena!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
大丈夫……！
これくらい平気だよ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: I'm fine! This much is nothing!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ふっ……あはははは！
その顔！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Hehe... Hahaha! What a lovely expression!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ワラワ達が憎いと……
ワラワ達こそが悪と
思い込んだ醜い顔！
Korean:
내가 밉다고....
우리들이야 말로 악이라고
믿는 추한 얼굴!

Name: #REF!
Origin: The scorn in your eyes—you truly believe we are the barbaric monsters!
Korean:
내가 밉다고....
우리들이야 말로 악이라고
믿는 추한 얼굴!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
大嫌いだわ……本当に。
思い上がりよ、
ニンゲン！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: I detest you. I truly do. Your hubris will be your undoing, child of man!

Name: #REF!
Origin: 貴様……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: You vile...

Name: #REF!
Origin:
さぁ……誰から
殺してほしいの？

Name: #REF!
Origin: Now... Who should I kill first?

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ふん……余裕だな。
そうしている間に俺が
貴様の首を切り落とすぞ！
Korean:
흥……여유롭군.
그러는 동안 내가
네 놈의 목을 베겠다!

Name: #REF!
Origin: Keep taking me that lightly, and you'll find your head lopped off soon enough.
Korean:
흥……여유롭군.
그러는 동안 내가
네 놈의 목을 베겠다!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
やってごらんなさい！
やれるものならね！

Name: #REF!
Origin: I would love to see you try! Come then! Show me you mean it!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
そんなものか！
貴様の恨みとやらは！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Is that all your hatred can muster? Pathetic!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
来るがいい、悪鬼の姫！
俺は逃げも隠れもしない！
Korean:
자 와라, 악귀 공주!
나는 도망치지도 숨지도 않아!

Name: #REF!
Origin: Bring it, princess of the fiends! I won't run nor hide...
Korean:
자 와라, 악귀 공주!
나는 도망치지도 숨지도 않아!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
お前の王が
そうであったように！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Not like your king did!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
その……醜い口で！
あの方を語るなぁっ！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Why you... How dare you speak of him!
